falcondebug_FlagDescription: Runs this command in debug mode
falcondebugext_FlagDescription: (hidden) Runs this command in extended debug mode
falcondebugxl_FlagDescription: (hidden) Runs this command in XL debug mode
falcondebugerr_FlagDescription: Displays extended information for uncaught Errors
falcondebugsuccess_FlagDescription: Displays extended information upon successful command completion
